synonyms.synonym: Apolipoprotein B mRNA-editing enzyme catalytic polypeptide-like 3H

protein.specific_function: DNA cytidine deaminase which may provide cellular innate resistance to a specific panel of genetic invaders including endogenous retroelements and a subset of viruses.

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on carbon-nitrogen (but not peptide) bonds
hydrolase activity, acting on carbon-nitrogen (but not peptide) bonds, in cyclic amidines
negative regulation of retroviral genome replication
